topics.body: I'm going to be honest here: I think the Xen level in Half Life 1 is fucking terrible.  The pseudo platforming is a pain the ass and they give you sweet f.a. for the parts where you have to fight alien soldiers.  If you're fighting against a enemy army in the game the last thing you want is for the game to give you no ammo for anything.
